data.title: ‘It Was Like a Zoo’: Death on an Unruly, Overcrowded Everest
data.desc: This has been one of the deadliest seasons on the world’s highest peak, with at least 10 deaths. Veteran mountaineers blame an increase in permits and too many inexperienced climbers.

data.title: A Migrant Family Takes a Greyhound Across America
data.desc: Greyhound buses have become an essential part of the journey for many Central American migrants, who provide revenue for the struggling company.

data.title: Nancy Pelosi and Fakebook’s Dirty Tricks
data.desc: This latest doctored video proves that Facebook as we knew it is over.
